item.title: Train - Hey, Soul Sister
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. Transposed up from the original Key of E. If you want to learn the song in the original key, I would suggest learning the chords in the Key of C and using a capo to move to E. I considered making a play along in C, but the voice became too warped.
As performed by Train
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
